original_text: Then he got into his chariot and rode to Jezreel, because Joram was resting there and Ahaziah king of Judah had gone down to see him.
korean_text: 예후가 병거를 타고 이스르엘로 가니 요람 왕이 거기에 누워 있었음이라 유다의 왕 아하시야는 요람을 보러 내려왔더라

sentences.original_text: Then he got into his chariot

sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 요람이 그곳에서 쉬고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: had gone down to see him
